headline: The Vassal Team is happy to announce the release of Vassal {{version}}.
important: If you are using MacOS 14, please ensure you are using 14.4 or later, to avoid a bug in MacOS which prevents Vassal from starting.

Modules saved in {{version_feature}} are not openable by earlier versions of Vassal. We recommend keeping a backup copy of any pre-{{version_feature}} modules you plan to modify in {{version_feature}} until you've verified that everything works to your satisfaction.
Things may be broken which worked previously. If you find a new bug, please report it.

bug_fixes.desc: Update logback configuration to prevent messages to console

other_improvements.desc: Upgraded bundled Java to 21.0.5 (32-bit Windows), 23.0.1 (all others)

bug_fixes.desc: Add saved games to Open Recent list on save
Prevent NoSuchMethod exception when opening Scenario Options in Editor

other_improvements.desc: Report HTML load errors as Bad Module Data, not Vassal bugs

bug_fixes.desc: Maintain all attachments when refreshing Pre-defined scenarios
Prevent crash when editing module with name shorter than 3 characters
Ensure pieces are indexed after Layer Change
At-Start Stack positioning tool now expands prototypes before displaying piece
Prevent crashes when refreshing counters with fewer Can Rotate facing
Ensure a GKC is never applied to same piece twice if it moves
Prevent crash in Does Not Stack during Edit Contained Pieces
Fix NPE When editing Game Piece Images
Coerce Regular Expression operator arguments to be strings to prevent Bad Data errors
Auto-attach does not attach to self when piece is added to a stack
Fixed bad link to GamePiece page in Reference Manual
Ensure OldMat is set when a piece leaves a Mat

other_improvements.desc: Remove workaround for Windows file dialog bug (12152)
Suppress error messages from expressions in text Labels during module load, or in Game Piece Palettes
Make Locked Scenario Options more legible
Improve Save and Load times by ignoring empty Stacks
Add a visual validator for Prototype name in Prototype trait
Prevent slowdown when editing multiple Prototypes in sequence
Report I/O Errors during Predefined Setup refresh in Refresher log, not as a Vassal bug
